name: 陳圳卿
objective:
設計心學課程主要探討人類與人造物之互動所產生之心或為態。以不同角度探討設計的需求與影響性，包含使用者或消費者使用人造物的認知心、使用者經驗、使用性與互動性等研究議題，強調設計者與使用者之間的溝通與心智之差性，進深入探討，並且從中學習相關研究問題之研究設計與資料處，奠定日後研究基礎。
Design psychology courses focus on the psychological or behavioral states that arise from the interaction of humans with man-made objects. Explore the needs and influence of design from different perspectives, including research topics such as the cognitive psychology of users or consumers using artificial objects, user experience, usability and interaction, emphasizing the communication and mental relationship between designers and users In-depth discussions will be conducted on the differences, and the research design and data processing of relevant research issues will be learned from it, laying the foundation for future research.
